ygData.subject: Re: Begging skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the begging skill is to get coppers off of npcs, not a very effective skill but its there for some reason. I dont think it gets you killed though.
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the begging skill is to get coppers off of npcs, not a very
effective skill but its there for some reason. I dont think it gets you
killed though.

----- Original Message -----
From: <dalex@...>
To: <EQFenninRo@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 8:28 AM
Subject: [EQFenninRo] Begging skill


> From: dalex@...
>
> Hi folks. Does the skill "Begging" serve any purpose in the game? Other
than getting people killed I mean. =)
>
> If it doesn't that's fine - I just don't want to wind up in a situation
where I'm trapped somewhere and have to beg a key off of some NPC.
>
> -Dan Alexander
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!

http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EQFenninRo
